pr_title: DHFPROD-5305: (DH 5.2) Provide privileges required for MLCP copy

timeline.bodyText: MlcpRunner was used to run legacy 4.x input flows. Are these changes meant to get the test running ?
timeline.author: srinathgit

replies.bodyText: I agree - I believe the only thing needed is the privilege addition so that MLCP from the command line will work. MlcpRunner is not in scope.
replies.author: rjrudin

replies.bodyText: The change is for a test to verify MLCP copy works with the operator role. The easiest way to test that was to leverage MlcpRunner.
replies.author: ryanjdew
